dc.title: MSAM/TopHat High Altitude Scientific Balloons measuring the anisotropy of the cosmic microwave background radiation
dc.description: MSAM/TopHat is a series of scientic experiments flying as a balloon payload in Antarctica. These experiments are desigend to measure the medium-scale anisotropy of the cosmic microwave background radiation (CMBR).
